trans-unit.source: HDInsight Hadoop Streaming Activity
trans-unit.target: HDInsight Hadoop Streaming Activity

trans-unit.source: This topic provides the JSON format that is supported by the July 2015 Release of Azure PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: This topic provides the JSON format that is supported by the July 2015 Release of Azure PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: If you are using an older version, see <link xlink:href="95596a66-6618-4a11-849a-492c4a0ddbcd" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">HDInsight Activity</link> for the old JSON format.
trans-unit.target: If you are using an older version, see <link xlink:href="95596a66-6618-4a11-849a-492c4a0ddbcd" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">HDInsight Activity</link> for the old JSON format.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <embeddedLabel>HDInsightStreamingActivity</embeddedLabel> Activity invoke a Hadoop Streaming job from an Azure Data Factory pipeline.
trans-unit.target: You can use the <embeddedLabel>HDInsightStreamingActivity</embeddedLabel> Activity invoke a Hadoop Streaming job from an Azure Data Factory pipeline.

trans-unit.source: The following JSON snippet shows the syntax for using the <embeddedLabel>HDInsightStreamingActivity</embeddedLabel> in a pipeline JSON file.
trans-unit.target: The following JSON snippet shows the syntax for using the <embeddedLabel>HDInsightStreamingActivity</embeddedLabel> in a pipeline JSON file.

trans-unit.source: See <externalLink><linkText>Develop C# Hadoop Streaming Programs for HDInsight</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/hdinsight-hadoop-develop-deploy-streaming-jobs/</linkUri></externalLink> for details about developing Hadoop streaming programs in C#.
trans-unit.target: See <externalLink><linkText>Develop C# Hadoop Streaming Programs for HDInsight</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/hdinsight-hadoop-develop-deploy-streaming-jobs/</linkUri></externalLink> for details about developing Hadoop streaming programs in C#.

trans-unit.source: Note the following:
trans-unit.target: Note the following:

trans-unit.source: Set the <embeddedLabel>linkedServiceName</embeddedLabel> to the name of the linked service that points to your HDInsight cluster on which the streaming mapreduce job will be run.
trans-unit.target: Set the <embeddedLabel>linkedServiceName</embeddedLabel> to the name of the linked service that points to your HDInsight cluster on which the streaming mapreduce job will be run.

trans-unit.source: Set the <embeddedLabel>type</embeddedLabel> of the activity to <embeddedLabel>HDInsightHadoopStreaming</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Set the <embeddedLabel>type</embeddedLabel> of the activity to <embeddedLabel>HDInsightHadoopStreaming</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: For the <embeddedLabel>mapper</embeddedLabel> property, specify the name of mapper executable.
trans-unit.target: For the <embeddedLabel>mapper</embeddedLabel> property, specify the name of mapper executable.

trans-unit.source: In the above example, <embeddedLabel>cat.exe</embeddedLabel> is the mapper executable.
trans-unit.target: In the above example, <embeddedLabel>cat.exe</embeddedLabel> is the mapper executable.

trans-unit.source: For the <embeddedLabel>reducer</embeddedLabel> property , specify the name of reducer executable.
trans-unit.target: For the <embeddedLabel>reducer</embeddedLabel> property , specify the name of reducer executable.

trans-unit.source: In the above example, <embeddedLabel>wc.exe</embeddedLabel> is the reducer executable.
trans-unit.target: In the above example, <embeddedLabel>wc.exe</embeddedLabel> is the reducer executable.

trans-unit.source: For the <embeddedLabel>input</embeddedLabel> property, specify the input file (including the location) for the mapper.
trans-unit.target: For the <embeddedLabel>input</embeddedLabel> property, specify the input file (including the location) for the mapper.

trans-unit.source: In the example: "wasb://adfsample@<account name>.blob.core.windows.net/example/data/gutenberg/davinci.txt": adfsample is the blob container, example/data/Gutenberg is the folder and davinci.txt is the blob.
trans-unit.target: In the example: "wasb://adfsample@<account name>.blob.core.windows.net/example/data/gutenberg/davinci.txt": adfsample is the blob container, example/data/Gutenberg is the folder and davinci.txt is the blob.

trans-unit.source: For the <embeddedLabel>output</embeddedLabel> property, specify the output file (including the location) for the reducer.
trans-unit.target: For the <embeddedLabel>output</embeddedLabel> property, specify the output file (including the location) for the reducer.

trans-unit.source: The output of the Hadoop Streaming job will be written to the location specified for this property.
trans-unit.target: The output of the Hadoop Streaming job will be written to the location specified for this property.

trans-unit.source: In the <embeddedLabel>filePaths</embeddedLabel> section, specify the paths for the mapper and reducer executables.
trans-unit.target: In the <embeddedLabel>filePaths</embeddedLabel> section, specify the paths for the mapper and reducer executables.

trans-unit.source: In the example: "adfsample/example/apps/wc.exe", adfsample is the blob container, example/apps is the folder, and wc.exe is the executable.
trans-unit.target: In the example: "adfsample/example/apps/wc.exe", adfsample is the blob container, example/apps is the folder, and wc.exe is the executable.

trans-unit.source: For the <embeddedLabel>fileLinkedService</embeddedLabel> property, specify the Azure Storage linked service that represents the Azure storage that contains the files specified in the <embeddedLabel>filePaths</embeddedLabel> section.
trans-unit.target: For the <embeddedLabel>fileLinkedService</embeddedLabel> property, specify the Azure Storage linked service that represents the Azure storage that contains the files specified in the <embeddedLabel>filePaths</embeddedLabel> section.

trans-unit.source: For the <embeddedLabel>arguments</embeddedLabel> property, specify the arguments for the streaming job.
trans-unit.target: For the <embeddedLabel>arguments</embeddedLabel> property, specify the arguments for the streaming job.

trans-unit.source: The <embeddedLabel>getDebugInfo</embeddedLabel> property is an optional element.
trans-unit.target: The <embeddedLabel>getDebugInfo</embeddedLabel> property is an optional element.

trans-unit.source: When it is set to <embeddedLabel>Failure</embeddedLabel>, the logs are downloaded only on failure.
trans-unit.target: When it is set to <embeddedLabel>Failure</embeddedLabel>, the logs are downloaded only on failure.

trans-unit.source: When it is set to <embeddedLabel>All</embeddedLabel>, logs are always downloaded irrespective of the execution status.
trans-unit.target: When it is set to <embeddedLabel>All</embeddedLabel>, logs are always downloaded irrespective of the execution status.

trans-unit.source: The availability setting on the output table (OutputTable in this example) of the activity determines when the activity is run.
trans-unit.target: The availability setting on the output table (OutputTable in this example) of the activity determines when the activity is run.

trans-unit.source: If you are using an on-demand HDInsight linked service, ensure that the blob storage associated with the linked service has the blob container, folder structure, and files that the HDInsight Streaming activity expects.
trans-unit.target: If you are using an on-demand HDInsight linked service, ensure that the blob storage associated with the linked service has the blob container, folder structure, and files that the HDInsight Streaming activity expects.

trans-unit.source: Other Activities
trans-unit.target: Other Activities
